HarmonyHIPVotingPlugin.note: To be deployed - HIP voting plugin implementation

HarmonyHIPVotingSetup.note: Deployed - HIP voting setup contract with allowlist check

HIPPluginAllowlist.note: To be deployed - Allowlist contract for HIP plugin access control

HIPPluginAllowlistProxy.note: Deployed - UUPS Proxy for HIP allowlist (initialized with Management DAO)

HarmonyValidatorOptInRegistry.note: Deployed - Validator opt-in registry for voting delegation

deployConfig.pluginRepoMaintainerNote: Management DAO - receber√° MAINTAINER_PERMISSION_ID, UPGRADE_REPO_PERMISSION_ID e ROOT_PERMISSION_ID sobre os PluginRepos

features.HarmonyDelegationVoting: Requires validatorAddress in installation params, supports UPDATE_VALIDATOR_PERMISSION
features.HarmonyHIPVoting: Restricted by HIPPluginAllowlist, only authorized DAOs can install
features.HIPPluginAllowlist: Controlled by Management DAO, manages which DAOs can use HIP plugin
